lines: 1. Di po ka nobed saa ma wang` chieng` opilre,Kama ler oketho mudho mar otieno,Ma Yesu nobi koa polo gi duong`neNi mond` okaw joge e piny.
Nyaka karang`o RuothYesu,eka wanakogi; Alleluya!Yesu biro! Alleluya, Amin!Alleluya, Amin!
2. Koso odiechieng`, koso ka piny oyuso,koso odiewuor, Ma mudho chieng` noturnwa,kod lerno malich; Ma norieny a e polo,Ka Ruoth Yesu omo joge.
3. Ogandane duto nokogi, Hosana!Malaika, To gi joge maler duto,ka Malaika kowe e boche polo,Ka Ruoth Yesu omo joge.
4. Nikech wan wakiya ndalo ma nobie,Onego warit chunywa mondo waikre,Chieng`no kik powa, kendo bura kik lowa,Ka Ruoth Yesu omo joge.
